title: Colleges Took in $5.2 Billion From Outside the US in 2025
description: US colleges received more than $5.2 billion in gifts and contracts from foreign sources in 2025, with more than half of those dollars going to just four schools: Carnegie Mellon University, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Stanford University and Harvard University.
content: US colleges received more than $5.2 billion in gifts and contracts from foreign sources in 2025, with more than half of those dollars going to just four schools: Carnegie Mellon University, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Stanford University and Harvard University.
